result.reason: External tools launched via Process.Start do not consistently take focus; explicitly setting the foreground window resolves this.
result.approach: Modify StartExternalProcess in ExternalTool.cs to asynchronously poll for the new process's MainWindowHandle and call SetForegroundWindow.
